name: smartresolve
description: Enterprise AI-powered customer complaint intelligence platform with multi-agent orchestration
author: SmartResolve Team

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w backend/services/summarization-service && npm install -w backend/services/resolution-service && npm install -w backend/services/complaint-api && npm install -w backend/services/audit-api && npm install -w frontend && npm install -w ai-agents/summarization-agent && npm install -w ai-agents/resolution-agent
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend/services/summarization-service" "npm run dev -w backend/services/resolution-service" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend/services/summarization-service && npm run build -w backend/services/resolution-service && npm run build -w backend/services/complaint-api && npm run build -w backend/services/audit-api && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.test: npm test -w backend/services/summarization-service && npm test -w backend/services/resolution-service && npm test -w frontend
